intro: Atropis skottsbergii, commonly known as the slender mallow, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Malvaceae family, which includes hibiscus and cotton. Atropis skottsbergii is adapted to arid environments and is often found in rocky or sandy soils.
